New Records: Yoshinobu Yamamoto will make his postseason debut in Game 5 of the NLDS, marking a new milestone for him in the playoffs.
Key Match Events: The game will feature a pitching duel between Los Angeles Dodgers starter Yoshinobu Yamamoto and San Diego Padres starter Yu Darvish, the first matchup of Japanese-born starting pitchers in postseason history.
Pre-Game Insights: Dodgers manager Dave Roberts emphasized Yamamoto's readiness and preparation for the game, while Padres manager Mike Shildt discussed their strategy and determination to win.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game is a winner-take-all matchup with significant implications for both teams.
